tagline: From same-day blood tests to advanced imaging, we coordinate everything.

benefits.description: We help you choose the right tests and provide upfront fees.
benefits.title: Plan

benefits.description: Samples taken in-clinic or scans booked at nearby centres—often same day.
benefits.title: Perform
Interpret
benefits.description: Dr. Abbas explains findings and next steps, sharing reports digitally.

features.description: We liaise with labs so you never chase results.
features.title: Concierge coordination
Clinical insight
features.description: Your GP interprets data in the context of your symptoms.

features.title: Speed
features.description: Most results shared within 1-3 days, often sooner.

description: An upgraded version of the diagnostics page on our previous site—designed to deliver answers faster.

seo.metaTitle: Private Blood Tests & Scans London | Rapid Diagnostics | Dr. SNA Clinic
seo.metaDescription: Arrange same-day blood tests, sexual health screens, imaging, and cardiac investigations with GP review included.

title: Private Tests & Scans

highlights: Priority access to partner imaging suites
GP review and action plan for every result
overview.content: Blood panels (hormones, thyroid, vitamins, sexual health), urine and stool tests, COVID & flu screens, ultrasound, X-ray, MRI, CT, DEXA, echocardiograms, and cardiac CT. We also coordinate niche tests such as allergy panels or fertility investigations.
overview.title: Diagnostics We Arrange

cta.title: Book Tests or Scans
cta.subtitle: Tell us what answers you need and we will arrange the right diagnostics today.

hero.subheadline: Our clinical team liaises with partner laboratories and imaging centres while you rest in our lounge.
hero.headline: Testing Without the Queue

faq.answer: We can accommodate urgent phlebotomy with short notice—call ahead so we can prepare kits.
faq.question: Do you offer walk-in blood tests?
Can I use these results with my NHS GP?
faq.answer: Yes, we can share copies or liaise with your NHS team if you consent.
Imaging centres bill separately, but we provide all pricing upfront.
faq.question: Are imaging costs included?
